Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): In vitro Diagnostic Devices for Bacillus spp. Detection
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC B. anthracis Real-Time PCR Assay for detection of B. anthracis chromosomal and plasmid DNA from various clinical specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of plasmid and chromosomal DNA sequences from B. anthracis in human respiratory samples, blood, serum, plasma, lesion swabs, CSF, pleural fluid, and bacterial culture isolates from suspected anthrax cases; results from direct specimen testing are presumptive, and use is limited to Laboratory Response Network designated laboratories
